start.instructions.title: How to play?
start.instructions.items: The goal of the game is to reach the destination Wikipedia article from the starting article.
You must navigate through the links in the articles.
Try to get there in as few clicks as possible!

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.introduction.title: Introduction
privacyPolicy.introduction.content: This site does not collect, store, or share personal data. We use only the browser's local storage (localStorage) to remember user preference settings, such as language and visual theme (light/dark). No tracking or usage analysis is performed, nor do we connect to external servers.
privacyPolicy.informationCollected.title: Information We Collect
privacyPolicy.informationCollected.perso: We do not collect any personal information such as names, email addresses, or contact details. All data remains on your device.
privacyPolicy.informationCollected.usage: We do not track your usage patterns, browsing behavior, or game statistics. No analytics tools are implemented on this site.
privacyPolicy.informationCollected.cooki: We use localStorage to save your preferences (language and theme) directly on your device. This data never leaves your browser and is not shared with third parties.
privacyPolicy.howWeUse.title: How We Use Your Information
privacyPolicy.howWeUse.intro: The minimal data stored locally is used exclusively to:
privacyPolicy.howWeUse.items.serviceProv: Remember your language preference for a better user experience
privacyPolicy.howWeUse.items.communicati: Maintain your chosen visual theme (light or dark mode)
privacyPolicy.howWeUse.items.improvement: Provide consistent settings across your gaming sessions
privacyPolicy.howWeUse.items.legalCompli: Ensure the site functions properly without external dependencies
privacyPolicy.informationSharing.title: Information Sharing
privacyPolicy.informationSharing.commitm: We do not sell, trade, or share your information with third parties. Your preferences remain exclusively on your device.
privacyPolicy.informationSharing.excepti: Since no data is collected or transmitted, there are no exceptions to this policy.
privacyPolicy.dataSecurity.title: Data Security
privacyPolicy.dataSecurity.measures.cont: Your data is secure because it never leaves your device. localStorage is managed entirely by your browser with no external transmission.
privacyPolicy.yourRights.title: Your Rights
privacyPolicy.yourRights.access.title: Access Your Data
privacyPolicy.yourRights.access.content: You can view your stored preferences through your browser's developer tools under localStorage.
privacyPolicy.yourRights.correction.cont: Change your preferences anytime through the site's settings menu.
privacyPolicy.yourRights.deletion.title: Delete Your Data
privacyPolicy.yourRights.deletion.conten: Clear your data by clearing your browser's localStorage or using the site's reset options.
privacyPolicy.yourRights.portability.con: Since data is stored locally, you have complete control over your information.
privacyPolicy.contact.title: Contact Information
privacyPolicy.contact.intro: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:
privacyPolicy.changes.title: Changes to This Policy
privacyPolicy.changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated revision date.
